page.para: Help! Dad has lost his key.
Dad looks in his pock/ets. The key is not there.
Dee/ksha looks un/der the ta/ble. The key is not there.
A/di/tya looks un/der the bed. The key is not there.
Mum looks in the draw/er. The key is not there.
Ha/ri/ta looks in the cook/ing pot. The key is not there.
Grand/ma looks in the news/pa/per. The key is not there.
Dad looks in his pock/ets a/gain. Oh yes!
